attributes.name: display
attributes.description: Display type of the container

attributes.name: block
attributes.description: Shorthand to use "display: block;"

attributes.name: flex
attributes.description: Shorthand to use "display: flex;"

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description: Shorthand to use "display: inline;"nm

attributes.name: maxWidth
attributes.description: Shorthand for "width: 100%;"

attributes.name: maxHeight
attributes.description: Shorthand for "height: 100%;"

attributes.name: noMargin
attributes.description: Shorthand for "margin: 0;"

attributes.name: noPadding
attributes.description: Shorthand for "padding: 0;"

attributes.name: alignItems
attributes.description: Align-items property of the container

attributes.name: alignContent
attributes.description: Align-content property of the container

attributes.name: justifyContent
attributes.description: Justify-content property of the container

attributes.name: flexWrap
attributes.description: Shorthand from "flex-wrap: wrap;"

attributes.name: elevation
attributes.description: Elevation of the container. (Values 0 - 12)

attributes.name: roundedCorners
attributes.description: Shorthand to round corners by material guidelines (4px)

attributes.name: verticalCenter
attributes.description: Shorthand to vertically center content (! Required display: flex !)

attributes.name: horizontalCenter
attributes.description: Shorthand to horizontally center content (! Required display: flex !)

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Width property of the container

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Height property of the container

attributes.name: flexDirection
attributes.description: Flex-direction property of the container

attributes.name: margin
attributes.description: Margin property of the container

attributes.name: padding
attributes.description: Padding property of the container

attributes.name: borderRadius
attributes.description: Border radius of the container

attributes.name: primaryAction
attributes.description: Button label and action on dialog's primary button

attributes.description: Button label and action on dialog's secondary button

attributes.description: Content of dialog

attributes.name: heading
attributes.description: Heading of the dialog element

attributes.name: stacked
attributes.description: Should dialog actions be stacked

attributes.description: Callback function launched as dialog is opened

attributes.name: onClosed
attributes.description: Callback function launched as dialog is closed

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Is the dialog open

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: Message displayed with the snackbar

attributes.name: timeout
attributes.description: Timeout in milliseconds until the snackbar fades away. Defaults to 4000

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position of the snackbar. Defaults to bottom

attributes.description: Function initiated if the user clicks on the snackbar

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Status / Theme of the snackbar. Defaults to Info

attributes.description: Does input field use the full width of the field

attributes.description: Report input validity on input rather than on blur

attributes.description: Trailing icon shown inside the input element

attributes.name: placeHolder
attributes.description: Placeholder text of input field

attributes.description: Helper text shown below input field

attributes.description: The matching pattern for the input component

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the input element

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label of the input element

properties.name: helperPersistent
properties.description: Determines if helper text is visible always or only on focus

properties.name: required
properties.description: Is input field required

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Is input field disabled

properties.name: fullWidth
properties.description: Does input field use the full width of the field

properties.name: outlined
properties.description: Style the input field as an outlined input element

properties.name: charCounter
properties.description: Enable character counter of input field (! Required maxLength to be set !)

properties.name: errorMessage
properties.description: Error message displayed on invalid input

properties.name: autoValidate
properties.description: Report input validity on input rather than on blur

properties.name: value
properties.description: Preset value of the input field

attributes.name: width
attributes.description:
Width of the card element. Automatically sized to reference
size between 250px and 350px if left unset

attributes.name: imageWidth
attributes.description: Width of the image on card. 100% if not set.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Title of the card element

attributes.name: subtitle
attributes.description: Subtitle of the card element

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: Content of the card element

attributes.name: image
attributes.description: Image url of the card element

attributes.name: dimOnHover
attributes.description:
Should the card dim on hover.
This should be turned on if the card is clickable

attributes.name: imagePadding
attributes.description: Padding of the image on the card element

attributes.name: elevated
attributes.description: Should the card be elevated

attributes.name: fontSize
attributes.description: Font size to scale the card contents by
